name: 99 Gummy Bears HD, Squishy Match 3
description:
99 Gummy Bears brings our favorite squishy candy to life with physics and visuals that are fun and dynamic. Gummy bears fall, tumble and get stuck just like in a jar. Each gummy bear is rendered in full 3D, representing all your favorite flavors, and colors change each new game. How fun is that! 99 Gummy Bears is an iOS exclusive, fast, fun and addictive.

Instructions:
Tap a gummy bear to match at least three of the same color, but get as many as you can together for bigger scores and a chance to find the hidden present. You've only got 99 Gummy Bears, so use them wisely, strategy and speed are key to maximum scores.

It's time to start tapping ... 99 Gummy Bears!

Highlights:
Realistic gummy bear physics.
Shootout w/Friends.
HD gummy bear graphics.
Sequential matching.
Completely freeform packing.
Hidden present bonus.
Perfect game bonus.
New colors every game.
Dramatic lighting effects.
Multiple difficulty levels.
High score tracker.
Game Statistics.
